author: barnabasbusa
content:
To test your client syncing to peerdas devnet 1 you can use this kurtosis config:
```yaml
participants:
  - cl_type: prysm
    cl_image: ethpandaops/prysm-beacon-chain:peerDAS
  - cl_type: lighthouse
    cl_image: ethpandaops/lighthouse:das
  - cl_type: teku
    cl_image: ethpandaops/teku:nashatyrev-das
network_params:
  network: peerdas-devnet-1
snooper_enabled: true
```

author: manunlp
content:
For Prysm, this message occurs when we are not able to read correctly the `csc` entry in a peer's ENR. In this case, we default to the default value.
This message should be a warning, or maybe even a debug message, since there is nothing we can do if the peer does not expose the `csc` entry.
So I doubt this error message is the root cause of the sync issue.

However, we have a sync issue. I'll investigate it. (probably on Monday: tomorrow is off for Offchain Labs)
